column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " I thought you said Bolin was coming ? "
#Text=Mako says : " He said he 'd be here , but I ca n't worry about it .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Tonraq , what do you want ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I heard you 're taking Korra to the South Pole .
#Text=I 'm coming .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Absolutely not .
#Text=You 're a distraction to Korra and a hindrance to what needs to be done .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " My daughter is not going without me !
#Text=She needs someone to watch after her .
#Text=" Korra says : " Dad , why do you always think you know what 's best for me ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Because he 's misguided .
#Text=The sad truth is , it 's men like your father who have put the Spirit World out of balance .
#Text=He 's ignored my warnings in the past and has n't learned since .
#Text=" Korra says : " What happened in the past ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=What matters is the Everstorm .
#Text=" Mako says : " The Everstorm ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " It 's a massive blizzard that 's battered the South Pole for decades .
#Text=I 'm coming , unless you think you can stop me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Guys !
#Text=Hey , wait for me !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Check it out , I 'm traveling in style !
#Text=Okay , uh , sorry , still getting used to that throttle .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , where 'd you get the ride ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Varrick ; he 's awesome !
#Text=He also gave me this fancy snowsuit !
#Text=It 's inflatable , with an internal heater , emergency beacon , and food ration pouches !
#Text=I mean , if I get lost , I can survive in this thing for like , like a month !
#Text=Who wants some freeze dried cucumberquats .
#Text=Nobody ?
#Text=... Did I interrupt a conversation ?
#Text=" Korra says : " No , the conversation is over .
#Text=Dad , come if you want , just do n't interfere with my training .
#Text=.
#Text=" Eska says : " Does this sidecar have the capacity for two passengers ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Sure does .
#Text=But , uh ... who 's gon na drive ?
#Text="
